InstructionData.Title: PRD - Pressure Reader
InstructionData.Author: rotiking(warg)
InstructionData.Instructions: # Pressure Reader​ # Model: PR-100​ # https://github.com/dtandersen/stationeers-library​ alias Pressure d0​ alias Bias d1​ alias pressure r0​ alias bias r2​ ​ move bias 0​ ​ start:​ l pressure Pressure Pressure​ brdns Bias 2​ l bias Bias Setting​ add pressure pressure bias​ s db Setting pressure​ yield​ j start
